It's an episode about moral relativism about what is considered torture and what is not, Robert Gerald Ford said. The hydraulic hybrid system gains fuel efficiency by capturing energy from the vehicle's brakes and using it to power the engine. We will still see many opportunities to improve fuel efficiency in internal combustion engines, Sergio Marchionne said. Sergio Marchionne said Chrysler would staff the project with "internal resources," and EPA executives said they don't expect to add jobs at the Ann Arbor lab to pursue the project. EPA
